p: The C. nutans plant was propagated using two techniques which were plant tissue culture and conventional propagation (stem cutting) techniques. The leaves were collected from six-week-old tissue-cultured and conventionally propagated C. nutans. The tissue-cultured plant of C. nutans was propagated on the best MS basal medium formulation obtained in Section 2. Meanwhile, a conventionally propagated plant was maintained under full sunlight and organic fertilizer was applied every five weeks.
